title: Did Ted Cruz Botch a Shakespeare Quote?
subtitle: As the world's first and only fact-checking organization named after Faulkner characters, we were shocked to hear demands that a soliloquy from "Macbeth" be attributed to the American author.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz messed up when he attributed the famous phrase "full of sound and fury / signifying nothing" to William Shakespeare.
